messages.message:
Hmmm - we are using the file service `PUT` file API under the hood which does return a `204` response code. I'm not sure why customers would think that this is broken behavior - @Lee could you elaborate on the feedback on this?

a `204` response code (https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Status/204) is a successful HTTP response code. In general `2XX` codes denote successful responses. Changing this to another 2xx code is trivial implementation wise but since this is a public API, it's not that easy to flip the switch if people have been using it
The batches API is only for AI Hub right? So changing this shouldn't have too much of an impact on customers if we can change now
This is mainly a usability improvement to indicate to the customer that the doc was uploaded successfully
